intro: Hedyosmum goudotianum var. mombachanum, commonly known as the Mombachanum holly, is a species of flowering plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is native to tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its evergreen foliage and small, fragrant flowers that bloom in clusters. It typically grows as a shrub or small tree, reaching heights of up to 5 meters. Its botanical features make it a valuable species for ornamental horticulture and ecological studies.
